definition: to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

sentences.english: It was probably the commissary of police who was making the legal summons at the other end of the street.
sentences.chinese: 也许是那警官在街的另一头，做他的例行劝降工作。

sentences.english: Of 3 patients who underwent aspirate corporis vitre hyponome combined with anterior chamber plasty. 3 eyes had failed.
sentences.chinese: 其中3例行抽吸玻璃体水囊联合前房形成术失败。

sentences.english: Prison life consists of routine. after that mort routine.
sentences.chinese: 监狱生活充沛了一段又一段的例行公务。

sentences.english: I wasn’t satisfied with this routine.
sentences.chinese: 我不满意这一例行公事。

sentences.english: Instead, they deal with the abstract login interface that the callable routine provides.
sentences.chinese: 相反，他们处理可调用例行程序提供的抽象注册界面。

sentences.english: There's nothing like an emergency at work to spice up another routine day at the office.
sentences.chinese: 没有什么例行工作比得上办公室里遇到的紧急事件了。

sentences.english: The surgeon visits to discuss the cases twice a week.
sentences.chinese: 外科医生每两周例行会诊并讨论病例。

sentences.english: No cerebrovascular event occurred in the 6 patients who underwent surgical revascularization.
sentences.chinese: 而6例行血管成形术患者中无一例发生脑血管事件。

sentences.english: Zen monks create routines to allow themselves to work more efficiently.
sentences.chinese: 禅僧建立例行公事使他们工作更有效率。

sentences.english: On March 25, Foreign Ministry Spokesman Kong Quan held the regular press conference.
sentences.chinese: 3月25日，外交部发言人孔泉主持例行记者招待会。

sentences.english: Most chores and hard work were done by the apprentices.
sentences.chinese: 所有例行的工作或者是粗活大都是由实习生来完成。

sentences.english: It's not only a daily routine.
sentences.chinese: 它可不只是每天的例行公事哦。

sentences.english: Welcome to the press conference. I have several announcements to start with.
sentences.chinese: 欢迎出席外交部例行记者会，首先我发布几条消息。

sentences.english: Prison life consists of routine. after which more routine.
sentences.chinese: 监狱生活充裕了一段又一段的例行公务。

sentences.english: I generally don't recommend routine screening tests looking for coronary artery disease.
sentences.chinese: 一般我不建议用例行筛查试验来寻找冠状动脉疾病。

definition: to patrol/to make a tour/to inspect/to scan with one's eyes
to convene (a conference or meeting)/to convoke/to call together
State Council Information Office of the People's Republic of China, abbr. for 國務院新聞辦公室|国务院新闻办公室[Guo2 wu4 yuan4 Xin1 wen2 Ban4 gong1 shi4]
normalized (statistics)/to normalize (relations etc)/to become the norm
to report/to give an account of/report
to report/to give an account of/to collect information and report back
